synopsis.text:
As a young girl embarks on a seemingly ordinary train ride, an advertisement sparks her curiosity and leads her on a quest to explore distant lands. Upon arriving in a city filled with surreal artwork reminiscent of Dali, Magritte, de Chirico, and Escher, she meets an old blind man who guides her through a maze of impossible staircases to the summit of a tower. However, the beauty of this strange world masks a darker reality that challenges the girl's perceptions.

Through this physical and emotional journey, the girl experiences the highs and lows of life, ultimately returning home transformed. Despite the profound change within her, she alone will comprehend the true extent of her growth. The film features a poem by renowned Chinese poet Su Tong-Po, adding a layer of depth to this surreal cutout animation.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
